original_text: Then the latter shall come into the realm of the king of the south but shall return to his own land.
korean_text: 북방 왕이 남방 왕의 왕국으로 쳐들어갈 것이나 자기 본국으로 물러가리라

sentences.original_text: Then the latter shall come into the realm of the king of the south
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 후자는 남방 왕의 영역으로 들어오리라

sentences.original_text: but shall return to his own land.
